blog.name: kissykindness
blog.title: Treat People with Kindness
blog.description: My place for some writing of the fabulous Harry Styles. Kissy.

title: Panic Attacks
body:
Warning: Mentions of mental illness, anxiety and panic attacks. Please be careful when reading.

This was requested from the this prompt list here. If you also want to request something, you can do this here or read all of my posts here.


It was never easy when Harry was away, but tonight, it was almost unbearable. (Y/N) had been suffering from anxiety for a long time, and it had gotten so much better when Harry had come into her life. He just had what it took to calm her down, so panic attacks had become less and less frequent. However, when he wasn’t there, it got worse. (Y/N) tried not to tell him, so he wouldn’t feel guilty for being away. But he noticed. He might not always tell her, but he definitely noticed.

It was the first time that Harry had been gone for over a month, engaged in interviews, tv appearances, writing music and visiting friends all over the globe. (Y/N) didn’t mind that he was doing all that, in fact she loved that he was so passionate for all that he was doing, but still, she missed him. And tonight, she missed him more then ever. She contemplated calling him for a few times already, but had always decided against it.

Right now, she could feel herself being moments away from another panic attack, one that would be the third one today. And honestly, all she wanted to do was being with Harry. But she didn’t want to worry him, she didn’t want to seem unsupportive.

The massive weight on her chest grew stronger and stronger until she felt like she couldn’t breathe anymore, tears started to spill from her eyes to her cheeks, she started to shiver. She was a mess. So she called him. After a few rings, he picked up.

“ ‘lo, darling”, he greeted her happily. “How’re you holding up?”

The sound of his voice made her forget how to form words for a moment. The only thing he could hear were her sobs.

“Oh baby, don’t cry”, he said, all cheer and happiness gone from his voice.

“ ‘m sorry, Harry”, she said between her sobs. She really didn’t want to cry, she just didn’t know how to stop.

“Shhh, it’s going to be okay, just breathe with me, okay? Breathe in, hold it, breathe out. Breathe in - your doing so good, baby”, he said as he could hear her breathing. “That’s it. Breathe in, hold it, and out.”

And it helped. He calmed her down again in an instant, just like it was nothing. And maybe, she thought, he made it fade away into nothing. She could barely remember why she was so stressed out.

“Thank you”, (Y/N) said a few minutes later, as her breathing returned to normal and her sobs had died down. “Been having a long night. I just really needed to hear your voice, I guess.”

“You should’ve called me earlier, love. Promise me you’ll call me when you feel it start again, okay?”, he asked. As he didn’t hear her answer, he decided to dig a little deeper. “(Y/N)? Baby?”

“I…. I don’t want to bother you”, she whispered.

“You don’t bother me, (Y/N). Never. So, what’s wrong?”

She was silent for a long time.

“I- I really need you, but I don’t want you to feel bad because of me. I want to support you, I really do, it’s just… hard without having you here”, she finally confessed, knowing that he wouldn’t let it go until she told him.

“I miss you, too, so much”, he said and she could swear that she heard his voice breaking a little. “ ‘f course I feel bad for not being with you, love, but honestly, it makes it a hundred times worse when I know you won’t call me when you’re feeling bad. Promise me you’ll call me next time? Please?”

She sighed. “I promise. But then it’s your fault if you get annoying calls from me all the time.”

“You don’t annoy me, love. Never.”

(Y/N) had been suffering from anxiety for a long time, and it had gotten so much better when Harry had come into her life. He just had what it took to calm her down, so panic attacks had become less and less frequent. However, when he wasn’t there, it got worse. (Y/N) tried not to tell him, so he wouldn’t feel guilty for being away. But he noticed. He might not always tell her, but he definitely noticed.

It was the first time that Harry had been gone for over a month, engaged in interviews, tv appearances, writing music and visiting friends all over the globe. (Y/N) didn’t mind that he was doing all that, in fact she loved that he was so passionate for all that he was doing, but still, she missed him. And tonight, she missed him more then ever. She contemplated calling him for a few times already, but had always decided against it.

Right now, she could feel herself being moments away from another panic attack, one that would be the third one today. And honestly, all she wanted to do was being with Harry. But she didn’t want to worry him, she didn’t want to seem unsupportive.

The massive weight on her chest grew stronger and stronger until she felt like she couldn’t breathe anymore, tears started to spill from her eyes to her cheeks, she started to shiver. She was a mess. So she called him. After a few rings, he picked up.

“ ‘lo, darling”, he greeted her happily. “How’re you holding up?”

The sound of his voice made her forget how to form words for a moment. The only thing he could hear were her sobs.

“Oh baby, don’t cry”, he said, all cheer and happiness gone from his voice.

“ ‘m sorry, Harry”, she said between her sobs. She really didn’t want to cry, she just didn’t know how to stop.

“Shhh, it’s going to be okay, just breathe with me, okay? Breathe in, hold it, breathe out. Breathe in - your doing so good, baby”, he said as he could hear her breathing. “That’s it. Breathe in, hold it, and out.”

And it helped. He calmed her down again in an instant, just like it was nothing. And maybe, she thought, he made it fade away into nothing. She could barely remember why she was so stressed out.

“Thank you”, (Y/N) said a few minutes later, as her breathing returned to normal and her sobs had died down. “Been having a long night. I just really needed to hear your voice, I guess.”

“You should’ve called me earlier, love. Promise me you’ll call me when you feel it start again, okay?”, he asked. As he didn’t hear her answer, he decided to dig a little deeper. “(Y/N)? Baby?”

“I…. I don’t want to bother you”, she whispered.

“You don’t bother me, (Y/N). Never. So, what’s wrong?”

She was silent for a long time.

“I- I really need you, but I don’t want you to feel bad because of me. I want to support you, I really do, it’s just… hard without having you here”, she finally confessed, knowing that he wouldn’t let it go until she told him.

“I miss you, too, so much”, he said and she could swear that she heard his voice breaking a little. “ ‘f course I feel bad for not being with you, love, but honestly, it makes it a hundred times worse when I know you won’t call me when you’re feeling bad. Promise me you’ll call me next time? Please?”

She sighed. “I promise. But then it’s your fault if you get annoying calls from me all the time.”

“You don’t annoy me, love. Never.”

title: Long Way Forward - Chapter 35
body:
It’s finally here. I’m proud to share it. I hope you enjoy it! Feedback is always appreciated!!!

Week 12

It’s been a week since you knew you’re pregnant. Harry didn’t let you do anything. He was a bit overprotecting. He always made sure you’re sitting comfortable or having enough space.

On the other hand you had work. Even though you had almost two months until the Judges’ House, but you had other tasks to do. You had check ups every week from now. It turned out you are pregnant for real. But this time you and Harry were more conscious about it. You did everything for your baby. The doctor said that because of the previous miscarriage, you should wait until week 12 to be sure of the pregnancy. The release of your albums were a bit delayed to September. So when both were out you had a little party to celebrate the success of your albums that were on top of all lists. Everyone was dying for Harry’s second album since the first one came out and finally everyone got that. And now that you were a Styles too, people were really curious about especially because it was known that most of your songs are about or for Harry.

On the party you welcomed producers, bands, family and friends to celebrate together. Harry made a toast and you stood by him, but you let him talk this time. You raised your glasses of champagne and then there was a reception. Gemma approached you as you were putting the sixth vegan roll into your mouth.

“Hey! Congrats on the album!” she said.

“Thanks, Gem!” you said while chewing.

“You must be really hungry,” she chuckled. “I haven’t seen you leave this table since the party started.

“Oh, yeah, I uh… haven’t eaten all day,” you said.

“I see,” she lowered her voice. “And I saw that you haven’t drank any alcohol, not even your champagne.”

“There’s no particular reason, Gem. I’m not feeling having alcohol tonight. And Harry drank, so I’ll be driving home, we came with the Rover and I didn’t want to get a cab and leave our car here.”

“Okay, I just noticed,” she smiled, but didn’t force this direction of the conversation. She knew how much pain it was for you to lose the baby the last time. She was sad about it too. She really wanted Harry to be a happy father.

Later in the evening, you drove home with Harry and you told him about the conversation with Gemma.

You frequently met your fellow judges in September and October too. There were a lot of behind the scenes work and things that had to be fixed very early. You enjoyed the work because it made you not think about how far week 12 is. But it got closer and closer day by day. You were still pregnant, you knew that and it was a good sign. One night you couldn’t fall asleep immediately and Harry was half asleep.

“Harry,” you whispered.

“Hm?” he reacted immediately.

“I’m feeling good about this pregnancy. I’m still pregnant and it’s week 10. I’d love to think that he or she will be born.” He turned around to see you and you saw his eyes even in the dark.

“You are a strong woman. We are so careful. There is a high chance that you will give birth in 30 weeks. I believe in you. You do everything you can.” He kissed your cheek.

“Thank you for believing in me,” you said.

“You’re my best friend, my other half, my everything. It’s obvious I believe in you and I support you.”

“What did I do to deserve you?” you chuckled.

“You do the same. You are there for me always. You care for me. You love me. You believed in me and my album when I doubted myself.” He kissed the top of your hand.

“I do. I do love you and believe in you:”

Two weeks later you were at the doctor’s waiting room with Harry. He called you in after ten minutes and you were really nervous. He did the tests and did an ultrasound. When the image loaded you started crying. Harry held your hand in both of his hands.

“Mrs. Styles, that’s a healthy fetus that you can see there.

“I can see the legs and arms,” you said through the tears. Harry was tearing too.

“Yes, let me show you something.” The doctor gently poked your belly. And you saw it, the fetus started moving a bit. You were crying again.

“The fetus is moving. At this time of the pregnancy, your fetus is closing and opening his or her fingers and curling toes. Also, the baby’s about to grow organs and tissues rapidly. If you want to find out the sex of the baby, we can do an ultrasound again in two weeks, but I can say it for sure around the twentieth week. You and Harry looked at each other.

“We’d like to wait with it for a while,” Harry said. You haven’t talked about it yet.

When you finished, you both were on cloud nine. First of all, you called your parents who were out of their minds in a good way. They sounded very excited. Then you called Anne who was just as excited as your parents. And the list went on, you called Gemma, Sara, Jeff, the 1D boys. Louis and Liam were very excited about Harry joining fatherhood.

Next week you were back on the X-Factor because you had to choose who you’re gonna take to the live shows. Everyone was betting on you taking Harry as your helper. And you did. But it wasn’t just him. Since you did a BBC Radio One performance with Dua Lipa, you texted sometimes and you became kind of friends. You asked her to help you too. This little group of three and the contestants of the Girls group travelled to Italy for a weekend. You rented a villa in Tuscany to stay in.

The girls were literally screaming when they saw that Harry is one of your helper, but they were happy about Dua too. The process was hard and the contestants were good. You were glad Harry and Dua were there to help you. In the end, you chose the four girls, Abby, Natalia, Rose and Aisha.

When you got back to London, in the next few days you had a lot of pre recording to do for the live shows. Even though Louis and Simon knew you were pregnant, you didn’t want to share it yet with the whole world including your girls. It was time to help them to get ready for the first show.

“Hm?” he reacted immediately.

“I’m feeling good about this pregnancy. I’m still pregnant and it’s week 10. I’d love to think that he or she will be born.” He turned around to see you and you saw his eyes even in the dark.

“You are a strong woman. We are so careful. There is a high chance that you will give birth in 30 weeks. I believe in you. You do everything you can.” He kissed your cheek.

“Thank you for believing in me,” you said.

“You’re my best friend, my other half, my everything. It’s obvious I believe in you and I support you.”

“What did I do to deserve you?” you chuckled.

“You do the same. You are there for me always. You care for me. You love me. You believed in me and my album when I doubted myself.” He kissed the top of your hand.

“I do. I do love you and believe in you:”

Two weeks later you were at the doctor’s waiting room with Harry. He called you in after ten minutes and you were really nervous. He did the tests and did an ultrasound. When the image loaded you started crying. Harry held your hand in both of his hands.

“Mrs. Styles, that’s a healthy fetus that you can see there.

“I can see the legs and arms,” you said through the tears. Harry was tearing too.

“Yes, let me show you something.” The doctor gently poked your belly. And you saw it, the fetus started moving a bit. You were crying again.

“The fetus is moving. At this time of the pregnancy, your fetus is closing and opening his or her fingers and curling toes. Also, the baby’s about to grow organs and tissues rapidly. If you want to find out the sex of the baby, we can do an ultrasound again in two weeks, but I can say it for sure around the twentieth week. You and Harry looked at each other.

“We’d like to wait with it for a while,” Harry said. You haven’t talked about it yet.

When you finished, you both were on cloud nine. First of all, you called your parents who were out of their minds in a good way. They sounded very excited. Then you called Anne who was just as excited as your parents. And the list went on, you called Gemma, Sara, Jeff, the 1D boys. Louis and Liam were very excited about Harry joining fatherhood.

Next week you were back on the X-Factor because you had to choose who you’re gonna take to the live shows. Everyone was betting on you taking Harry as your helper. And you did. But it wasn’t just him. Since you did a BBC Radio One performance with Dua Lipa, you texted sometimes and you became kind of friends. You asked her to help you too. This little group of three and the contestants of the Girls group travelled to Italy for a weekend. You rented a villa in Tuscany to stay in.

The girls were literally screaming when they saw that Harry is one of your helper, but they were happy about Dua too. The process was hard and the contestants were good. You were glad Harry and Dua were there to help you. In the end, you chose the four girls, Abby, Natalia, Rose and Aisha.

When you got back to London, in the next few days you had a lot of pre recording to do for the live shows. Even though Louis and Simon knew you were pregnant, you didn’t want to share it yet with the whole world including your girls. It was time to help them to get ready for the first show.
trail.content:
It’s finally here. I’m proud to share it. I hope you enjoy it! Feedback is always appreciated!!!

Week 12

It’s been a week since you knew you’re pregnant. Harry didn’t let you do anything. He was a bit overprotecting. He always made sure you’re sitting comfortable or having enough space.

On the other hand you had work. Even though you had almost two months until the Judges’ House, but you had other tasks to do. You had check ups every week from now. It turned out you are pregnant for real. But this time you and Harry were more conscious about it. You did everything for your baby. The doctor said that because of the previous miscarriage, you should wait until week 12 to be sure of the pregnancy. The release of your albums were a bit delayed to September. So when both were out you had a little party to celebrate the success of your albums that were on top of all lists. Everyone was dying for Harry’s second album since the first one came out and finally everyone got that. And now that you were a Styles too, people were really curious about especially because it was known that most of your songs are about or for Harry.

On the party you welcomed producers, bands, family and friends to celebrate together. Harry made a toast and you stood by him, but you let him talk this time. You raised your glasses of champagne and then there was a reception. Gemma approached you as you were putting the sixth vegan roll into your mouth.

“Hey! Congrats on the album!” she said.

“Thanks, Gem!” you said while chewing.

“You must be really hungry,” she chuckled. “I haven’t seen you leave this table since the party started.

“Oh, yeah, I uh… haven’t eaten all day,” you said.

“I see,” she lowered her voice. “And I saw that you haven’t drank any alcohol, not even your champagne.”

“There’s no particular reason, Gem. I’m not feeling having alcohol tonight. And Harry drank, so I’ll be driving home, we came with the Rover and I didn’t want to get a cab and leave our car here.”

“Okay, I just noticed,” she smiled, but didn’t force this direction of the conversation. She knew how much pain it was for you to lose the baby the last time. She was sad about it too. She really wanted Harry to be a happy father.

Later in the evening, you drove home with Harry and you told him about the conversation with Gemma.

You frequently met your fellow judges in September and October too. There were a lot of behind the scenes work and things that had to be fixed very early. You enjoyed the work because it made you not think about how far week 12 is. But it got closer and closer day by day. You were still pregnant, you knew that and it was a good sign. One night you couldn’t fall asleep immediately and Harry was half asleep.

“Harry,” you whispered.

“Hm?” he reacted immediately.

“I’m feeling good about this pregnancy. I’m still pregnant and it’s week 10. I’d love to think that he or she will be born.” He turned around to see you and you saw his eyes even in the dark.

“You are a strong woman. We are so careful. There is a high chance that you will give birth in 30 weeks. I believe in you. You do everything you can.” He kissed your cheek.

“Thank you for believing in me,” you said.

“You’re my best friend, my other half, my everything. It’s obvious I believe in you and I support you.”

“What did I do to deserve you?” you chuckled.

“You do the same. You are there for me always. You care for me. You love me. You believed in me and my album when I doubted myself.” He kissed the top of your hand.

“I do. I do love you and believe in you:”

Two weeks later you were at the doctor’s waiting room with Harry. He called you in after ten minutes and you were really nervous. He did the tests and did an ultrasound. When the image loaded you started crying. Harry held your hand in both of his hands.

“Mrs. Styles, that’s a healthy fetus that you can see there.

“I can see the legs and arms,” you said through the tears. Harry was tearing too.

“Yes, let me show you something.” The doctor gently poked your belly. And you saw it, the fetus started moving a bit. You were crying again.

“The fetus is moving. At this time of the pregnancy, your fetus is closing and opening his or her fingers and curling toes. Also, the baby’s about to grow organs and tissues rapidly. If you want to find out the sex of the baby, we can do an ultrasound again in two weeks, but I can say it for sure around the twentieth week. You and Harry looked at each other.

“We’d like to wait with it for a while,” Harry said. You haven’t talked about it yet.

When you finished, you both were on cloud nine. First of all, you called your parents who were out of their minds in a good way. They sounded very excited. Then you called Anne who was just as excited as your parents. And the list went on, you called Gemma, Sara, Jeff, the 1D boys. Louis and Liam were very excited about Harry joining fatherhood.

Next week you were back on the X-Factor because you had to choose who you’re gonna take to the live shows. Everyone was betting on you taking Harry as your helper. And you did. But it wasn’t just him. Since you did a BBC Radio One performance with Dua Lipa, you texted sometimes and you became kind of friends. You asked her to help you too. This little group of three and the contestants of the Girls group travelled to Italy for a weekend. You rented a villa in Tuscany to stay in.

The girls were literally screaming when they saw that Harry is one of your helper, but they were happy about Dua too. The process was hard and the contestants were good. You were glad Harry and Dua were there to help you. In the end, you chose the four girls, Abby, Natalia, Rose and Aisha.

When you got back to London, in the next few days you had a lot of pre recording to do for the live shows. Even though Louis and Simon knew you were pregnant, you didn’t want to share it yet with the whole world including your girls. It was time to help them to get ready for the first show.

heyy baby

hi babe

how are you?

looong day just want to snuggle up to my love but he’s away on tour 😔

awwwww im sorry I wish I was at home with you

don’t be silly you love touring

yeah but I love you more

don’t I’m on my period rn and I’m super emotional you’ll make me cry

I should be there to bring you painkillers and run your stomach and sing until the pain goes away

harry don’t be so stupid

good luck

harry?

yes my love?

I love you so much baby

bye I love you

title: Lovebird- He’s a Friend
body:
PREVIEW 

Full chapter up tomorrow!! 💕💕

MASTERLIST

“I see. Well thank you again. For letting me stay over.”

“Honestly, don’t mention it. As weird as it is to not be on my own on a morning, it’s nice to have someone to talk to before I leave for work.” Harry smiled at her before putting his mug back on the table, looking at the pots that were sat at the other end. Y/N noticed where he was looking at quickly grew embarrassed. “I swear I’m going to clean them up! I just couldn’t be bothered yet.”

Without saying a word, Harry stood up from his space and picked the two plates, knife, forks and cups up and walked them to the sink, turning the tap on and letting the water run hot. He lifted the fairy wash liquid from the window ledge and put some into the sink once he’d put the plug in, letting the dishes sit in the water for a little bit while he grabbed a sponge to clean them with. Y/N sat and watched him in awe, no one had ever done the pots for her when she’d cooked for them. Let alone someone she met a mere three days before.

“Harry, you really don’t have to wash them. I can put them in the dishwasher before I leave.”

“It’s no bother. And after you made me such a gorgeous dinner it’s only fair that I do something in thanks.” He smiled at her before turning the tap off and sticking his hands into the hot water, wincing momentarily when the sudden temperature change startled him, before wiping the pots clean.

blog.name: call-us-losechesters
blog.title: Treating people with kindness
blog.description:
stanning #Sebastian Stan
#Winchesters 
#Zarry
#Stucky
and everything in between

body:
Just curious

How can people hate Zayn for leaving one direction? I mean i have seen his videos of him starving himself cause his musical preferences were not in sync with the people he worked with. I mean AS FRUSTRATING AS THAT IS … cant you just realize that it’s like being in an toxic relationship? I mean, when you are not happy in a relationship you quit. Then why cant he? I was just scrolling through and first i saw a pic of him from 2014 and then i saw his latest pic and i was like woahhhh… Is that the same guy? No hollow eyes, no dull skin, no tiredness what-so-ever. He deserves to be healthy and happy. And you cant hate a person for wanting that.

Zayn deserves all the respect and love and care and peace

And Harry styles too. Both of them deserve each other.

title: Mr. Malik
body:
Epilogue

“I want to come home,” Katherine breathed, standing in front of Zayn with her two suitcases.“Okay,” he said evenly, feeling his heart come alive again because of her.Zayn didn’t even realize…

Read more…

summary: "When people label people as famous, they take away a lot of substance that they have as a person, so you don't remember someone...
body:
“When people label people as famous, they take away a lot of substance that they have as a person, so you don’t remember someone as he was funny or they were really nice & giving. It’s like ‘they were famous’ , & then it becomes a thing where anything after that, whatever you choose afterwards, if it’s not as famous or more famous than it was before considered failure. And that’s a shame, cuz it’s not failure, always”

- Harry Styles🌸 (@larrywhispers )

reblog.comment:

title: Back to the Start
body:
Sequel to Stars in Your Eyes

Chapter One

August 2014“I think your father and I should tag along,” Jay said to her daughter as Louis packed up his car with their belongings for school.“What? No way,” Shay told her.“Not with you…
